DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial pilot study investigate efficacy different amount total treatment dosage six week 60 volunteer subject lumbar spinal stenosis . Subjects evenly randomize four group either flexion distraction ( FD ) care control : Group 1 8 total FD treatment visit , Group 2 12 total FD treatment visit , Group 3 18 total FD treatment visit , Group 4 8 total placebo control visit . The study design : ( 1 ) To determine feasibility large scale study term logistics , recruitment effort , sample size estimation ( 2 ) To determine among three treatment group change perceive pain level general functional health status end six week treatment three month post care follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Males female least 50 year old lumbar spinal stenosis Impingement cord and/or exit nerve root evidence spine imaging study Symptomatic current pain back and/or one leg . Symptoms must present least six month insidious onset Congenital stenosis spine deformity current spinal fracture , spinal infection , tumor spine Prior lumbar spine surgery laminectomy , spinal fusion , discectomy lack stability occur within past 3 month . Currently pregnant nursing Comorbid condition may preclude person participate active care ( lay prone treatment table completing exercise ) outcome measure ( Treadmill Testing , completion questionnaire ) , severe cardiopulmonary disorder ( i.e . : severe coronary artery disease , recent myocardial infarction , vascular claudication ) , neuromusculoskeletal disorder ( i.e . : disable hip knee arthritis ; trochanteric bursitis ; piriformis syndrome ; need assist ambulation ) , brain disorder ( i.e . : dementia Alzheimer 's Disease ) Active conservative care physical therapy chiropractic care lumbar stenosis ( exclude use oral medication daily athome exercise general wellbeing ) Cauda equina symptom ( i.e . : perianal numbness ; loss bowel and/or bladder control ) Not fluent literate English language . We able provide multiple translator within pilot study Current future litigation low back leg pain
